00007 template <class SRC, class FEATURE>
00008 vector<typename FEATURE::STATE >
00009 XVGroupTracker<SRC, FEATURE>::nextState() throw (XVTrackerException) {
00010   
00011   source.next_frame_continuous();
00012 
00013   vector<STATE > states(features.size());
00014   for(int i = 0; i < stepsPerFrame; ++i){
00015     for(int f = 0; f < features.size(); ++f){
00016       states[f] = features[f]->step(source.current_frame());
00017     }
00018   }
00019   
00020   return states;
00021 };
00022 
00023 template <class SRC, class FEATURE>
00024 void XVGroupTracker<SRC, FEATURE>::track() throw(XVTrackerException) {
00025     
00026   while(1){
00027     
00028     source.next_frame_continuous();
00029 
00030     for(int i = 0; i < stepsPerFrame; ++i){
00031       for(int f = 0; f < features.size(); ++f){
00032      features[f]->step(source.current_frame());
00033       }
00034     }
00035   }
00036 };

00038 template <class SRC, class WIN, class FEATURE>
00039 vector<typename FEATURE::STATE >
00040 XVDisplayGroupTracker<SRC, WIN, FEATURE>::init(){
00041 
00042   source.next_frame_continuous();
00043   window.CopySubImage(source.current_frame());
00044   window.swap_buffers();
00045   window.flush();
00046 
00047   vector<typename FEATURE::STATE > states(features.size());
00048   for(int i = 0; i < features.size(); ++i){
00049     states[i] = features[i]->interactiveInit(window, source.current_frame());
00050   }
00051 
00052   window.setCOPY();
00053   return states;
00054 };
00055 
00056 template <class SRC, class WIN, class FEATURE>
00057 vector<typename FEATURE::STATE >
00058 XVDisplayGroupTracker<SRC, WIN, FEATURE>::init(XVSize & size) {
00059 
00060   source.next_frame_continuous();
00061   window.CopySubImage(source.current_frame());
00062   window.swap_buffers();
00063   window.flush();
00064 
00065   vector<typename FEATURE::STATE > states(features.size());
00066   for(int i = 0; i < features.size(); ++i){
00067     states[i] = features[i]->interactiveInit(window, size, source.current_frame());
00068   }
00069 
00070   window.setCOPY();
00071   return states;
00072 };

00074 template <class SRC, class WIN, class FEATURE>
00075 void XVDisplayGroupTracker<SRC, WIN, FEATURE>::track() 
00076 throw(XVTrackerException) {
00077 
00078   while(1){
00079     
00080     source.next_frame_continuous();
00081 
00082     for(int i = 0; i < stepsPerFrame; ++i){
00083       for(int f = 0; f < features.size(); ++f){
00084      features[f]->step(source.current_frame());
00085       }
00086     }
00087 
00088     window.CopySubImage(source.current_frame());
00089 
00090     for(int f = 0; f < features.size(); ++f){      
00091       features[f]->show(window);
00092     }
00093     
00094     window.swap_buffers();
00095     window.flush();
00096   }
00097 };

00100 vector<typename FEATURE::STATE >
00101 XVDisplayGroupTracker<SRC, WIN, FEATURE>::nextState() 
00102 throw (XVTrackerException) {
00103   
00104   source.next_frame_continuous();
00105   
00106   vector<STATE > states(features.size());

00108     for(int f = 0; f < features.size(); ++f){
00109       states[f] = features[f]->step(source.current_frame());
00110     }
00111   }
00112 
00113   window.CopySubImage(source.current_frame());
00114   
00115   for(int f = 0; f < features.size(); ++f){

00117   }
